body:
Sure, see below:
    
    (gdb) r
    Starting program: /root/hello
    Cannot access memory at address 0x0
    Cannot access memory at address 0x0
    
    Program received signal SIGILL, Illegal instruction.
    0x00067620 in ?? ()
    (gdb) x/i $pc
    => 0x67620:     mcr2    4, 7, r8, cr2, cr0, {7}
